entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
